response.overview: Bheem (56) a strict but respected retired teacher with diabetes is sending an invitation for tomorrow to the whole village for his only son’s wedding, except his estranged younger brother’s family due to a lingering feud. Overworked and stressed in the wedding preparations Bheem gets a diabetic attack at night. He reverts to his former authoritarian self Bewildering villagers and family. This unexpected turn of events leads to a heartwarming realization.

production_companies.name: Dada Lakhmi Chand State University of Performing and Visual Arts, Rothak
Pandit Lakhmi Chand State University of Performing and Visual Arts

response.title: Family Invitation
